channel.title: Pvp everywhere?
channel.description: My current source that im using starts you off in varrock bank, and when you walk out of the bank your in the wildy ?! How do i turn this off? Thanks :D

item.title: Pvp everywhere?
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

its source sided its depended on your deob and client base

For us to help you we need to know what deob it is e.g 317 474 508+

And What base it is e.g if its 317 pi delta ect

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp everywhere?
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

[size=18pt]ASSUMING IT’S DELTA 317[/size]

You have to get a different source, that would be a lot easier. But there is a way to turn it off in certain areas.
Open [font=andale mono][size=14pt]Client.Java[/size][/font]

Search for public boolean isInWilderness(It’s backward I think for Delta. So isinwilderness = notinwilderness)

You will see something like this:

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2377 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3143 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942)***ADD HERE***) { return true; }

Add this to where is says ADD HERE

||((coordY >= #1#1) && (coordY <= #2#2) && (coordX <= #3#3) && (coordX >= #4#4)

KEY:
#1#1=Lowest X Coordinate
#2#2=Lowest Y coordinate
#3#3=Highest X Coordinate
#4#4=Highest Y Coordinate

Hope that helped.

Read full topic
